oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. Lizzie Crozier French Scrapbook, p. 05 c
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lizzie Crozier French Scrapbook, p. 05 c. Newspaper clipping: 'Smoke Abatement Up For Discussion.' (fragment). (See also Lizzie Crozier French Scrapbook, p. 05 d).

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Smoke Abatement Up For Discussion The Constitutional League will hold its regular meeting at 3 o'clock this afternoon at the Lyceum build- lng, and at 4 o'clock, just following the completion of the program, (missing) has announced a mass meeting to be held in the interest of the abate- ment of the smoke nuisance.
